seo.title: 78 Elm Street, Bronxville NY — $925,000
seo.description: 3BR end-unit townhouse in Bronxville Village. Steps to Metro-North and top-ranked Bronxville schools. PENDING.

description:
Stunning end-unit townhouse in the heart of Bronxville Village — steps from the train, restaurants, and top-ranked schools. Built in 2015 with superior craftsmanship, this three-bedroom residence offers townhome living without compromise.

The main level features 9-foot ceilings, wide-plank hardwood floors, and an open-concept kitchen with granite countertops and stainless appliances. The living/dining area opens to a private patio perfect for summer entertaining. A powder room completes the first floor. Upstairs, the primary suite includes a walk-in closet and en-suite bath. Two additional bedrooms share a well-appointed hall bath.
